    • getTopDevCards

      public java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.Image> getTopDevCards()
      Method to get the image of the top card of each development card space.
      Returns:
      A list where each element is the Image of the card on top of each development card space in GUI. If an element is set to null there are no cards in that development card space.
